definitions.definition: a track that serves as a path

examples.text: They came out of the woods and onto a pathway.
A man came in sight further down the pathway.
A row of white stones marked the pathway across the marsh.
There is a brick pathway with flower beds on either side.
There was a pathway with steps cut into the cliff.

definitions.definition: a plan of action or way of achieving something

examples.text: We help students define and develop a clear career pathway.

definitions.definition: a route formed by a chain of nerve cells along which electrical signals travel from one part of the body to another
